The claim was published on Facebook on J: 2020, and has been shared more than 200 times.
The Thai: language post suggests that eating products made from soybeans, such as tofu, can increase the risk of memory loss and Parkinson's disease.
The claim was also shared on multiple Fa: 4. Experts, including Kanitha Tananuwong from Chulalongkorn University's Department of Food Technology and Thailand's Food and Drug Administration, have stated that there is insufficient evidence to support the claim and that consuming soybeans is not harmful to the brain.
